mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carrel 4-8, west wall
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Donohue, Liam Patrick [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Curse against men, possibly an adaptation of 2 Pac's misogynistic song "Fuck Bitches Get Money," which is also cited in Carrels 4-14 and 2M-1; this graffiti in graphite pencil shows signs of having been edited (with the A in "MAN" being erased and changed to an E, as visible by eraser marks and a scribbled out response alluding to the mistake directly to the right of "MEN"). [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
F*!K MEN only one? Lol | Aquire currency $ _feminism!!_
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Social movements
Feminism
Money
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
